reviewText: The women in my group loved this study.  I highly recommend it.
A must buy for all women of God.
Good for men and women
Our young adult women's group is using this as study material and they are so pleased with the ideas and possibilities offered through this DVD series.

I lead a junior/high school Bible study and we have really enjoyed the CD and book.  It takes a different approach to the women in the Bible than I have seen before, but is accurate in doctrine.  It have many very respected women for you to learn from in the video as well.

We have bible study study class and we are on the 5th woman from this teaching. Our group is blessed by the study and the discussions we have after the video. Some revelations from some of the woman happen to be quite amazing and scary. But the study is encouraging the bible study group to share which is a blessing.

I am using this book and the CD for an interdenominational, neighborhood bible study.  We like that the study includes "lecture" from each of the women who contributed to this book.  The twelve women are separate chapters each with a different author.  The followup questions encourage lively discussion.
This is an awesome women's bible study the characters are not unlike the women we are today . Very relivent for today .
I chose this rating because I liked the subject matter for our small group Bible study.  We desired something that would take Biblical ideals and use them in today's life.
I did not receive the workbook for this DVD. The video is very insightful and informative. I just wish that the book stated was in the package as well.
Looking forward to doing this study with my small group!
Great used this and other for women's Retreat.  Would also be great for small group.
Good study

Check the dvd and case. Wrong person on the dvd. I ordered twice and got the wrong one both times. I still have the second one. Just got tired of fooling with it. Even tho I sent several messages no one took time to correct

Different perspectives to the stories of Bible women. Backed by scripture, but examined at a modern, personal level. Very thought-provoking and  excellent for small group discussion.  Excellent for all ages of women.
Our Sunday school class is doing this study and so far it is very good.

Interesting study, but the short (15-20 minutes) video sessions could have been better.  The videos were made by several different women, filmed in a living room setting.  The connection that is made in a live session was lost, and several of the women appeared to be reading directly from a teleprompter.  The discussion questions were pretty good and did help in getting the group thinking and participating in a discussion.  The subject women of the Bible were good to study, although they used some of the more obscure women in the Bible.  All in all, this was not one of the best Bible studies I have led over the years.  A good try, but it falls short.

I was expecting a biblical analysis of the twelve women of the Bible that lead one to a better understanding of their role in the formation of Christianity. The DVD is more a series of sermons pointing out the weaknesses within the female and how better to look at life, etc. I am  disappointed with my foolish acquisition
Great study for our church women ministry  real woman real issues were just what we needed
Not my favorite study, but okay
